name: T. N. Vijaykumar
content: T. N. Vijaykumar - Elmore Family School of Electrical and Computer Engineering - Purdue University T. N. Vijaykumar Professor of Electrical and Computer Engineering Campus: West Lafayette Office: BHEE 320 Office Phone: +1 765-494-0592 Fax: +1 765-494-2706 E-mail: vijay@purdue.edu Webpage: https://engineering.purdue.edu/~vijay/ Address Purdue University Elmore Family School of Electrical and Computer Engineering Max W and Maileen Brown Family Hall 465 Northwestern Ave. West Lafayette, Indiana 47907-2035 Degrees B.E. (Hons) Electrical and Electronics Engineering and M.Sc.(Tech) Computer Science, Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani, India, 1990 M.S. Computer Science, University of Wisconsin, 1992 Ph.D. Computer Science, University of Wisconsin, 1997 Research Computer architecture Areas of Interest Computer Engineering VLSI and Circuit Design Indicates primary area for this faculty member. Note that a few faculty members have more than one primary area.
